name: Agent Orange
description: Donâ€™t let the name scare you! The only herbicidal warfare Agent Orange will wage is between the excellence of this strain's flavors and uplifting effects. A well-balanced hybrid that combines the smooth Orange Velvet with the bold Jack the Ripper, Agent Orange will capture your senses. Wonderful smells of oranges and fresh-cut citrus fruit will entice you immediately, while the pigments of deep maroon and purple will make this bud stand out in a sea of green. The effects are uplifting and motivating, serving as a great mood enhancer if you are feeling lethargic or depressed.
attributes_title: Happy, Uplifted, Relaxed, Euphoric, Creative, Stress, Depression, Pain, Headaches, Fatigue, Dry Mouth, Dry Eyes, Dizzy, Anxious, Paranoid
